How do I restart alsa?: Well, I made the fatal mistake of trying to use two different applications that produce sound at the same time, and now I have no sound at all.
crumsun: I thought that if I could somehow restart alsa, all would be well in the kingdom.
I had mp3s playing in Rhythmbox, and I tried to watch a flash video in Firefox.
have you closed both Firefox and Rhythmbox?
it's the best place to start debugging
I closed both apps, but still no sound
pastebin the output from the above command
interesting, esd is running. Close it by unchecking (in GNOME) System> Preferences> Sound> Enable software sound mixing
Seems to work now. That was easy :)
